Name: sin-naseemismailand-lad
Author: Naseem Ismail And Masoor Maulana, Kaleel

Translations.Text: (nabiyē!) obagē hṛdaya api vistīraṇaya kaḷē nædda
obagē barada obagen ǣt kara api bæhæra kaḷemu
eya obagē tunaṭiya kaḍā damamin tibuṇi
obagē kīrtiyada api oba venuven usas kaḷemu
niyata vaśayenma duk gæhæṭa samaga sæpatak æta
ættenma duk gæhæṭa samaga sæpatak æta
ebævin (lovehi kāraṇāvangen) oba ǣt vū vahāma (næmadumaṭa) oba pariśramaya æra ganu
tavada (dukehida, sæpatehida) obagē deviyanvama oba balā siṭinu mænava
attikkā matada, seyitūn (oliv) matada, sattakinma
sināyi kanda matada sattakinma
(makkāva vana) ārakṣāva labā dena mema nagaraya matada sattakinma
niyata vaśayenma api minisāva itāmat alaṁkāravat hæḍayakaṭa utpādanaya kara ættemu
(ohugē napuru kriyāvanhi hētuven) pasuva ohuva dīnavūvangenut dīna vūveku bavaṭa api pat kara harinnemu
ehet kavurun viśvāsaya tabā dæhæmi kriyāvan karamin siṭinnōda, ovun hæra. (ovun usas gatiguṇayangen yutuva siṭina atara) ovunṭa (sadākalma) novæḷækvena (hon̆da) phalavipāka æta
mema tīnduven pasu (nabiyē!) obava kavurunṭa nam boru kaḷa hækida
viniścaya karannan siyallagen allāh itāmat usas viniścayakaruvā noveda
(nabiyē! siyallama) utpādanaya kaḷa oba deviyangē śuddha vū nāmayen (magē niyōgayan aḍaṁgu śuddha vū kurānaya) oba samudīraṇaya karanu mænava
ohuma minisāva lē kæṭiyen utpādanaya kaḷēya
(nabiyē! nævatat) oba samudīraṇaya karanu (mænava!) obagē deviyan ati viśāla dānapatiyeki
ohuma pǣnak magin (livīmaṭa) igænvūvēya
tavada (emagin) minisā nodannā dæya siyalla ohuṭa uganvā dennēya
(mesē tibiyadī) minisā (ohuṭa kṛtagna vīma venuvaṭa) ættenma
tamanṭa (deviyangen) avaśyatāvayak nomætteku yayi adahas karamin ohuṭa venaskam karannēya
niyata vaśayenma obagē deviyan vetama (ohu) nævata pæmiṇiya yutuva ættēya
(nabiyē!) vaḷakvā damannāva oba (avadhānaya kara) bælūvehida
ek vahaleku salāt karana viṭa
ohu ṛju mārgayehi siṭimin hō
pariśuddhabhāvaya aṇa karamin siṭiyadī (ohuva, ohu vaḷakvā hærīma) oba (avadhānaya kara) bælūvehida
ohu, (ohuva) boru kara pratikṣēpa kara hærīmada oba avadhānaya kaḷehida
(ohu karana mema napuru kāraṇāvan) niyata vaśayenma allāh balannēya yanna ohu dæna gattē nædda
(mesē ohu kaṭayutu kirīma) sudusu næta. (mema napuru kriyāvangen) ohu ǣt novuvahot api naḷal kes rodin allā adinnemu
enam væradi karana ema borukārayāgē idiri kes vahallen
ebævin ohu (tama udavvaṭa) tama sabhāvē ayava kæn̆daviya yutuya
apida (ohuva nirayaṭa yævīmaṭa nirayehi) ārakṣakayinva kæn̆davannemu
ebævin (nabiyē!) niyata vaśayenma oba ohuṭa avanata novanu. (obagē deviyanṭa) hisa navā næmada (sujūd kara ohu veta) ḷaṁ vanu mænava
niyata vaśayenma api meya (mema kurānaya itāmat gauravayen piri) leyilatul kadr namæti ek rātriyakadī (paḷamuvenma) pahaḷa kara tæbuvemu
(nabiyē!) ema gauravayen piri rātriyē (mahimaya) oba dannehida
gauravayen piri ema rātriya māsayan dahasakaṭa vaḍā itāmat usas vannēya
ehi malāyikāvarunda, (jibrīl vana pariśuddha) ātmayada, tama deviyangē niyōgayaṭa anuva (sidu viya yutu) siyalū kāraṇāvan samaga pahaḷa vannāha
śāntiya hā samādānaya samaga- (ema rātriya) aḷuyam kālaya udā vana turuya

dharmaya himi ayagenda, samānayan tabā namadinnangenda, (meya) pratikṣēpa karannangenda bohomayak denā taman veta pæhædili sādhakayan pæmiṇena turu (yamkisi sādhakayak pæmiṇiyahot meya anugamanaya kaḷa yutuya yayi hon̆da adahasin) ǣt novī (sthīrava) siṭiyaha
(ovun veta pæmiṇa æti pæhædili sādhakayā kavurundayat, ovunṭa) pariśuddha vū dharmayan samudīraṇaya kara penviya hæki allāhgē (mema) dūtayāya
(ohu kiyavā penvana) ehi sthīra vū nīti rītima saṭahan karanu læba ættēya
(ohugē pæmiṇīma balāporottuven ohuva anugamanaya kirīma san̆dahā yayi pavasamin siṭi) dharmaya himi aya, taman veta pæhædili sādhakayā (ādī apagē dūtayā) pæmiṇi pasu (ohuṭa) venaskam karannāha

(ehet ovunṭa nam), deviyangē miśra novuna dharmayama anugamana kara, (anit dharmayan) pratikṣēpa kara, allāh ek kenekuvama næmada, salātayada nokaḍavā iṭu kara, sakātayada gevā siṭina men misa, (vena kisivak mema dūtayā magin) aṇa karanu læbuvē næta. (meya ovungē dharmayehida aṇa karana lada kāraṇāvaki). meyama sthīra vū (nīti rīti valin yut) dharmayayi

ebævin dharmaya himi ayagenda, samānayan tabā namadinnangenda, (mema nabivarayāgē pæmiṇīma balāporottuven siṭi ayagenda) kavurun (ohuva) pratikṣēpa karannōda, ovun niyata vaśayenma nirā ginnehima siṭinnāha. ehi ovun sadākalma ræn̆dī siṭinnāha. mevænnanma utpādanayan siyallagen imahat napuranya
ehet (mema nabivarayāgē pæmiṇīma balāporottuven siṭi ayagen) kavurun (ohuva) viśvāsa kara, dæhæmi kriyāvan karannōda, ovun niyata vaśayenma utpādanayan siyallagen śrēṣṭhayanya

ovungē phalavipāka ovungē deviyangē sannidhānayehi æti sthīra vū svargayan vannēya. ēvāyehi diya daharā sadākal galaminma tikheṇu æta. sadākalma ovun ēvāyehi ræn̆dī siṭinu æta. allāhda ovun gæna tṛptiyaṭa pat vannēya. ovunda allāh gæna tṛptiyaṭa pat vannāha. kavurun tama deviyanṭa biya vannōda, ovunṭama (mevæni bhāgyaya lækhennēya)
balavat bhūmi kampāva æti vī
bhūmiya, taman usuḷāgena siṭina dæya (siyalla piṭataṭa) vīsi kara damana avasthāvēdī
minisā (tigæssī) meyaṭa kumak nam sidu vī ætda? (kumak nisā mesē vevlannēda?)’yi vimasanu æta
edinadī eya tama kāraṇāvan (siyalla) dænum denu æta
mandayat (mesēma) obagē deviyan vahī magin tamanṭa niyōga kaḷēya (yayi kiyanu æta)
edinadī minisun (hon̆da hō naraka hō) tamangē vipat dakinu piṇisa (vividha koṭas vaśayen khedī) samūha samūhayan vaśayen (viniścaya san̆dahā) pæmiṇenu æta
ebævin kavurun ek anu pramāṇayak hō pinak kara tibuṇē nam, ohu (ehidī) eya dæka gannēya
(esēma) kavurun ek anu pramāṇayak hō pāpayak kara tibunēda eyada ohu (ehidī) dæka gannēya
husma hira vena taramaṭa adhika vēgayen duvana aśvayin matada
(duvana vēgayenma kura gæṭennaṭa salasvā) gini pupuru vīsi vannaṭa salasvana dæya matada
tavada udē pāndara (saturan kerehi) pæna duvana dæya matada
(esē vēgayen duvana viṭa, valākuḷu men) emagin dūvili avussā damana dæya matada
pasuva (saturangē sēnāva) madhyayehi ē hētuven atuḷu vana dæya matada sattakinma
niyata vaśayenma minisā tama deviyanṭa keḷehiguṇa nodakvanneku vaśayen siṭinnēya
niyata vaśayenma ohuma meyaṭa sākṣi vaśayenda siṭinnēya
niyata vaśayenma ohu itāmat dæḍi vaśayenma vastuvaṭa ādaraya karannēya
